alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero and east central Pueblo Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Fowler, or 31 miles west of La Junta, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Otero and east central Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
